text: 16:13 Jon 14:17; 14:26; 15:26; 1 Jon 2:20; 2:27Ezɨ Godɨn Duam, a guizɨn akam mɨgeir Duam, a izɨva, ian nɨghnɨzibar amutɨ ia guizɨn akaba bar dagh fogham. A uabɨ uan nɨghnɨzimɨn akatam mɨkemeghan kogham. Puvatɨ. Akar an oraghizim, akar kamra an an gun mɨkɨmam. Egh a bizir gɨn otivamibar gun ia mɨkɨmam.
